name: PSX-Scene cleaner extreme
description: Removes all the ads - plus more - from PSX-Scene.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.psx-scene.com'), url-prefix('http://psx-scene.com') {

body {
margin-top: -2em;
}

center>table td[width='87']+td>table,
td[width='87'],
td[width='160'],
div.smallfont,

td[background*='header_bg'],

div.cse-branding-bottom>div:not(.cse-branding-form),

	td[width='160']>div:not(:last-child),
	td[width='160'] center,
	td[width='160'] br,
	
	td[width='160']>form[action*='searchresults']>div:nth-of-type(2),
	td[width='160']>form[action*='searchresults']>div:nth-of-type(3),

td[width='160']+td>center,
div.page>div>center,
img[src*='sponsors'],
#pagenav_menu+div,
#pagenav_menu~table[border='0']:not(.tcat),

td[width='125'],

#posts div[style*='float:left; width:300px'],
#posts div[id*='edit']>div,

iframe[src*='googleads']
{display:none !important}

div.cse-branding-bottom
{background:transparent !important}

}
